summary: Fitness/workout plan app with avatar support. User wants the 'Your Workout Plan' section background changed to green.

existing_features.title: In WorkoutPlanView.tsx, change the background color of the 'Your Workout Plan' banner/header section to green. Apply a solid green background (e.g., Tailwind class 'bg-green-600' or similar green shade) to the section or container that displays the 'Your Workout Plan' heading.

new_feature_requests.summary: Change background color of 'Your Workout Plan' section to green
